channel.title: [PI] all my questions atm
channel.description:
hello all, ik i post alot arry about that heres a few questions i have right now:
1. how do i make it so when a player clicks a chest a npc spawns?
2. How do i make an NPC say that im online?
3. How do i delete doors or ingame Objects?
thats all for now. plz dont flame me. ik i ask alot but ill start t only post one topic thxs to whoever is willing to help me

item.description:

how? bc i didnt understand fully of wht it ment it didnt rele tell me nething on how to have it spawn a npc from a chest
ive looked at the barrows shit and i couldnt tell or find out how that is. so from wht u 2 told me didnt rele explain that much to me.

item.title: [PI] all my questions atm
item.dc:creator: @killershand6 killershand6
item.description:
@killershand6 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]1: I’ve told you about four times now, stop expecting to be spoon-feed.

2: Loop through the players, check to see if the player equals your user name, if it does it means you’re online. Store that status as a String, then make an NPC talk by following my tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470354.msg3439024.html#post_A7

3: You need to use a map editor, or rip the method from Delta to delete inbetween tile data.[/quote]

yes i know u have told me a few times. you didnt explain far enough for me to under stand.

Read full topic
